titles.title: Sing Ye Heavens For The Lord Hath Done It

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing, ye heavens, for the Lord has done it,
Shout, ye lower parts of the earth,
Break into song, ye seed of Abraham and God;
For the abased and despised of the world
Hath God chosen and quickened from the dead,
Calling those things which be not as though they were.
To bring to nought the wisdom of this world,
And to confound those things that are mighty;
The foolishness of God is wiser than all men,
The weakness of God is stronger than death,
Yes, amen, amen, amen, amen!
